A25: @akamai has partnered with @geoguard_ for VPN/Smart DNS Proxy detection for online streaming services. Check out https://t.co/lCJtSmF0eD - @aweil
Q25: Who is Akamai partnering with for their EPD offering? #AskAkamaiAri
A24: @akamai classifies IP addresses to makes access control decisions using 3rd-party metadata. We do this in partnership with @geoguard_ - @aweil
Q24: How does Enhanced Proxy Detection work?
A23 (2): Proxy detection to prevent unauthorized viewers that can compromise your ability to generate revenue is another https://t.co/lCJtSmF0eD - @aweil
A23: Standard #TLS & TLS 1.3 support to protect against content piracy is one https://t.co/6NHIl1fLN1 - @aweil
Q23: What are some of the ways in which Akamai is helping protect content?
A22: Yes absolutely: 1) providers may blackhole traffic above a threshold, 2) deployed resources can be overwhelmed, 3) cost to absorb attacks - @aweil
Q22: Why do I need #DDoS protection for applications in the cloud? Won’t the provider take care of that?
A21: @akamai #security is #cloud agnostic, and protects inbound traffic to any origin. See some examples https://t.co/sfaeHZM23C - @aweil
Q21: Can you protect apps in Google Cloud? #AskAkamaiAri
A20: #edge complements #cloud with scale, capability and proximity. @gartner does a great job at explaining this https://t.co/6EYPbsIyWa - @aweil
Q20: What’s the difference between edge and cloud? #AskAkamaiAri
A19: Our EdgeWorkers solution is slated to beta in the fall. Learn more about it here: https://t.co/vtJQ7t8DJI - @aweil #AskAkamaiAri
Q19: What's the timeline for launching EdgeWorkers? - @dbelson
A18: Great question @SteveD3 - have a look at this document addressing AIO bots and more https://t.co/nbJbBJGFYJ - @aweil

Q18: AIO bots are tricky, as they can be configured and customized to mimic a real human, leading to several evasion techniques. How is @Akamai staying ahead of the crooks using AIOs and their evasions? - @SteveD3
A17 (3): There's a helpful @forrester report with more details and why @akamai has a leading solution here https://t.co/CUkiKaPArX - @aweil
A17 (2): Key strategies include 1) proactive monitoring, 2) browser & app challenges, 3) progressive/step-up challenges, 4) evolving defenses - @aweil
A17: #bot management is just that - management. You can't durably stop bots b/c they morph so fast & frequently. https://t.co/L9hXeog7Ip - @aweil
Q17: When it comes to credential stuffing, what are some key changes organizations can make that will help slow or outright stop these threats? - @SteveD3
A16 (2): Large companies have a lot at stake - reputation, revenues - but small companies can be overwhelmed or fail to scale up due to compromise. - @aweil
A16: Costs range from opportunity cost and revenue loss, to misaligned resources. We recently published a great #Akamai_SOTI report on this https://t.co/IHmLZhC1YE - @aweil
Q16: When it comes to #bots, what is the impact in terms of resources on organizations? Is the cost impact worse if the company is smaller? - @SteveD3
A15 (7): Read more about how we help businesses focus on OWASP top 10 concerns here: https://t.co/hOBfNdlj4r - @aweil
A15 (6): Starting with the March 2019 release, we automatically inspect and protect payloads with our web app protector #waf https://t.co/X7LCPogPoC - @aweil
A15 (5): Then there are #APIs - a massive and growing threat vector. We make it really simple to onboard them to our API Gateway https://t.co/ugvquDEvl4
A15 (4): More on intelligence - automated attack groups protect against OWASP and more without you chasing CVEs https://t.co/1bxJmHXeHp - @aweil
A15 (3): Move to intelligent automation - #ddos is dropped at the edge for a zero second mitigation https://t.co/nob8jKrT67 - @aweil
A15 (2): Start with insight - real-time visibility, alerting, and ability to take action across #ddos, #appsec, #bot, and #malware threats
A15: With integrated solutions and flexibility in consuming them! - @aweil
Q15: How specifically does Akamai enable and enhance the flexibility of #security teams, in ever-changing business landscapes? - Gretchen Asaff
A14: Hyper-focus on #cloud deployments. #http2, TLS 1.3, support for every browser, automated #security - we want customers focused on their apps and users - @aweil
Q14: How is the March Release different from past @Akamai releases? - @HollyMargaret3
A13 (5): Fifth, d'you think #devsecops is real? How do you do it across clouds? @akamai offers #apis to snap into existing processes so every app is protected. - @aweil #AskAkamaiAri
A13 (4): Fourth, #cloud #security requires awareness & rigor to avoid misconfigurations/plain mistakes. #edge security creates a defensive shield to insulate you. - @aweil
A13 (3): Third, where does your #threat_intel come from? @Akamai sees the most threats with experts to derive insights https://t.co/zk9td1u1dm - @aweil
A13 (2): Second, you likely don't hire/staff experts in building and operating #ddos, #waf, #bot, #identity tools - so consume them aaS - @aweil
A13: First, #security controls are necessarily siloed with #cloud providers - @akamai provides a single solution. - @aweil #AskAkamaiAri
Q13: Can you talk more about the #security challenges related to cloud migration organizations face? How can @Akamai help? - @kimberly_gomez
A12 (2): This is related to a great article I love to reference on the SAFe approach that speaks to moving from problem solving to focused execution: https://t.co/tJJXoCRvq6 - @aweil
A12: An #enterprise solution deployed as a single proxy improves time to mitigate. @akamai automates protections and offers scripting to snap into existing processes. - @aweil
Q12: With an existing multi-cloud strategy in place, how can companies transition to @Akamai and employ additional #security measures without disruption? - @kHyal
A11: #cloud agnostic automation: 0-sec #ddos mitigation, #appsec & #api protection, img/video acceleration. APIs to script it or fully managed have our services manage it - @aweil
Q11: How will the @Akamai March Release save businesses time? - @pinkarmajillo
A10: #http2 and standard TLS are critical for secure performance at scale - check out this blog for more insight: https://t.co/tRHmoZ2JyX - @aweil
Q10: What aspects of the new release have the biggest impact on improving digital user experiences? - @GarrettHuddy

A8: @akamai has a great resource on this at https://t.co/tYFNc0YHRA Check it out! - @aweil

Q7: Which of Akamai's latest accomplishments are you most proud of? (Too many to choose from I know) - @kchags25
